title.narrative: Promoting UK-China collaborations in areas such as co-productions and film exports, to support economic reform and diversification in China, thereby generating opportunities for international business, including from the UK

description.narrative: The project is designed to support the internationalisation of the Chinese film industry by enhancing UK-China collaborations particularly in areas such as co-productions and film exports. This will include improving policy skills, expertise and policy frameworks that support China's engagement in international markets. It is intended that UK and Chinese industries develop a relationship that fosters an increased understanding of each others' creative and commercial working practices. This will help facilitate co-productions more effectively and increase the competitiveness of Chinese films internationally, thereby promoting economic rebalancing in China and generating opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.
